We Empower Your Water Sustainability Journey

Unlock Data-Driven Water Management with Our Non-Invasive Flow Metering Solutions.


Contact Us

Our Services

Digital Cloud Dashboard

SonoMicro's cloud-based software suite seamlessly integrates with our hardware, providing real-time data visualization and actionable insights to optimize water usage and reduce waste. Partner with us on your digital journey towards sustainable water management, and access our comprehensive suite of hardware and software solutions.

Hardware-As-A-Service

Our services offers access to non-invasive, portable, and simple-to-install liquid flow measurement instrument that provides precise, real-time water flow data, allowing for efficient water usage monitoring at a minimal, budget-friendly licencing fee.

OEM Service

SonoMicro offers customized hardware solutions for seamless integration into clients' existing machinery and assets, ensuring compatibility and enhancing water management capabilities within their operations.

View All Services

Welcome to SonoMicro, your partner in sustainable water management solutions.

Our advanced sub-metering technology and digital platform enable data-driven optimization of water. Experience the SonoMicro advantage with our customer-centered services. Experience the SonoMicro advantage today.

  • No process interruption nor downtime needed and runs without affecting flow pressure.
  • Autonomous, real-time measurements of water flow for efficient water consumption monitoring, helping you meet CSRD regulatory requirements.
  • Seamless integration and user-friendly interface for easy implementation and data visualization.
  • Tailored recommendations for optimizing water usage and reducing waste, contributing to a sustainable future.
  • Cost-effective access to comprehensive hardware and software solutions, meeting budget constraints and enabling organizations of all sizes to embrace sustainable practices.

How Sonomicro's Water Data Collection Solutions Can Support the EU's Water Security Commitments

Sonomicro provides innovative water data collection solutions that help businesses make actionable, data-guided choices for sustainability. With the EU announcing 33 commitments for global water security, Sonomicro's solutions can play a key role in addressing some of these commitments.
